panels.visual: Alric raising jagged key Muttering incantation **Sound EFFECTS:** "VRRRRMMMMM"
Chaotic barrier swirling around Alric Kaleidoscope of elemental colors All five essence types clashing **Sound EFFECTS:** "WHOOOOOOSH"
Prismor's sword striking barrier Sparking off harmlessly **Sound EFFECTS:** "CLANG-SPARK!"
Sorrel flying into chamber Golden wings spread
panels.dialogue: Sorrel: "The Orrery's mind is open! Reach out through your skills! You can guide the lenses!"
